text: Ainsley Earhardt is an American television personality and broadcast journalist. She works for Fox News. She is the co-host of Fox & Friends and also reported for Hannity with her own segment called "Ainsley Across America". ==References== ==Other websites== * FoxNews.com bio * Ainsley Earhard on Twitter * Ainsley Earhardt on Facebook * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American television personalities Category:American journalists Category:American television news anchors Category:American political commentators Category:Fox News people Category:Writers from South Carolina Category:People from Spartanburg, South Carolina
title: Ainsley Earhardt
